This is a really great idler/auto-battler game for your desktop. While this is just a demo, there's enough here that I would've already been willing to spend a few bucks on this.

The game itself is fun/entertaining, though I think that where this really shines is the Ui and UX. The UI is intuitive and clean. And I love the simplicity of being able to right-click-drag the borderless window around, and it also snaps to the edges of the screen as well as to the Windows taskbar. That's really nice for a little desktop game that may need to be repositioned on the fly.

I think it could use some balancing/numbers tweaks here and there, but I haven't noticed any major issues.

Really satisfying to play this idle game with loot drops, levels with various benefits and standard upgrades.
Found a couple of issue tho:
- Prestige aka ascension replaces your multiplier, meaning if you have a nice big mult then whether accidentally or really curiously ascend early, the game resets your multiplier.
- Stats don't show dmg, atk spd, shot amount, wpn dmg, not that big a deal in the late game tho
- Still haven't found any A rank loot (maybe it's just my luck)
- In the early game, the ai that shoots doesn't have any movement anticipation, so fast enemies that spin around you are really hard to hit, but again, not that big a deal in the late game

For a demo, this was a 8.5/10 experience, pretty amazing all in all.
